article_title: IOM report on patient safety inspires documentary
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The landmark Institute of Medicine report, "To Err is Human: Building a Safer Health System," has inspired the idea for a new patient safety documentary about the healthcare crisis in America, according to a recent announcement by Tall Tale Productions.
